thread.title: CORRECTING and REPLACING Cachet Financial Services Introduces I [Heart] ACH
thread.title_full: CORRECTING and REPLACING Cachet Financial Services Introduces I [Heart] ACH

author: admin
title: CORRECTING and REPLACING Cachet Financial Services Introduces I [Heart] ACH
text:
Cachet Financial Services 
PASADENA, Calif. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- Headline of release should read: Cachet Financial Services Introduces I [Heart] ACH (instead of Cachet’s Financial Services Introduces I [Heart] ACH). In the contact, company name should read Cachet Financial Services (instead of Cachet Services). 
The corrected release reads: 
CACHET FINANCIAL SERVICES INTRODUCES I [HEART] ACH 
A Revolutionary, Patent Pending Service and Simplified ACH Solution 
Cachet Financial Services announces the introduction of I [Heart] ACH, their revolutionary and patent pending service intended as a simplified ACH solution. The company continues to expand their solutions and services to strengthen their overall product line and to advance ACH payment services. 
The I [Heart] ACH product features discounted processing fees, transactional account reconciliation not typically offered by banks, and no NSF reserve requirement. Target businesses include payroll providers who process a large majority of expedited settlement transactions who simply want to save money on their ACH processing. 
The industry is proceeding towards ‘Same Day ACH’ in an effort to move payments faster according to NACHA (The Electronic Payments Association) with the newly adopted rule taking place in late 2016. “Cachet Financial Services is confident we are paving the way for the new ruling with the introduction of I [Heart] ACH to support our clients and the industry as a whole,” states company Vice President of Sales, Brandi Utria. 
In a final update, Cachet Financial Services has adopted a new URL for their newly launched website. Interested clients can now visit the website at www.cachetservices.com . 
About Cachet Financial Services: 
Cachet Financial Services is a national company providing ACH processing services for electronic transactions such as direct deposits, tax payments, garnishment payments, benefits payments and fee collections. Additionally, Cachet Financial Services has a complimentary menu of service options to support the Payroll Service Industry and mid-market to large corporate clients. As experienced leaders in the business, Cachet provides electronic payment transactions for approximately 85,000 employers nationwide, processing over 95 billion dollars annually. Cachet offers competitive rates and fees for each of their innovative and customized services, presenting payroll service bureaus and corporate clients with an alternative to using traditional banks for their ACH processing needs. For more information about the services offered by Cachet Financial Services, please contact Brandi Utria at (626) 578-9400 or email us at info@cachetbanq.com . You may also visit our website at www.cachetservices.com . View source version on businesswire.com: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20151021006534/en/ Copyright © Business Wire 2015
